channel.title: Pages on plusSixOne
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on plusSixOne

item.title: Project: World Cup Datathon
item.author: jamesthomasday@gmail.com (James Day)
item.description: In celebration of the World Cup in Russia, I’ve decided to take on Betfair’s World Cup Datathon. See below my series of posts outlining how I built my models. This is part of a series of posts on the World Cup Betfair datathon. See the links to others below. Part 1 - Intro Part 2 - Data Acquisition Part 3 - Data Exploration and Feature Engineering

item.title: AFLW - Coming soon
item.author: jamesthomasday@gmail.com (James Day)
item.description: For those looking for AFLW content - hang tight! Unfortunately, due to the new nature of AFLW, data is hard to come by. I managed in the first season by manually adding data after each game but this is not feasible. I’m hoping, with help from anoafl, to add some data scraping into our newly released fitzRoy package. Details on that can be found here

item.title: Cool Links
item.author: jamesthomasday@gmail.com (James Day)
item.description: The AFL Analytics community is wonderfully inclusive and supportive. If you are looking for discussions about AFL Analytics, I highly reccomend Twitter. There is a very active commnity there. AFL Data Most of the data I use comes from the following two websites AFL Tables Footy Wire AFL Analytics Below are some fantastic blogs that I could only dream to be. They create some amazing content week in week out.

item.title: Current Tips
item.author: jamesthomasday@gmail.com (James Day)
item.description: Welcome to our all new AFL Men’s tips page! Here you will the tips for the upcoming rounds. I’ll usually aim to update these early in the week to give you time to digest Any questions, let me know on Twitter! Last updated 2020-07-21 17:47:06. Day Venue Home.Team Away.Team Prediction Probability Result Thu, 23 Carrara Gold Coast Footscray 0.

item.title: Ratings and Simulations
item.author: jamesthomasday@gmail.com (James Day)
item.description: Welcome to our all new AFL Men’s ratings and tips page! Here you will the latest ratings, tips for the upcoming rounds and any simulations that have been done. I’ll usually aim to update these early in the week to give you time to digest Any questions, let me know on Twitter! Last updated: 2020-07-21. Summary Below are the updated AFL Men’s ratings and simulations. These are based off our ELO model and simulations.

item.title: About me
item.author: jamesthomasday@gmail.com (James Day)
item.description: This site is very much under construction. I am a data loving Biomechanist by trade. I graduated from my PhD in 2016 form the University of Queensland. I’m currently currently working in Sports Science Research and Development at a Brisbane based sports technology company, Fusion Sport. I’m using this blog mostly to develop better skills in data science, in particular using R, developing visualisations and understanding various machine learning techniques. I am also obsessed with AFL.
